alert.note: Alert for Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 03 at 11:43AM AKST until January 03 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * WHERE...Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
